mdq:check.name: Entity Format Present
mdq:check.description: Check that each entity has a format specified.
mdq:check.code:
def call(): global output global status global entityFormat
import metadig.variable as mvar
# An entity format is not present if 'entityFormat' not in globals() or entityFormat is None: output = "No entity formats were found." status = "FAILURE" return False
entityFormat = mvar.toUnicode(entityFormat) # If only a single value is returned (vs type "list"), then convert to a list # for easier processing if(isinstance(entityFormat, str)): entityFormat = [entityFormat]
# Check if the entity format is a single string if(len(entityFormat) == 1): output = "1 entity format was found." else: output = "{} entity formats were found".format(len(entityFormat))
status = "SUCCESS" return True

selector.name: entityFormat
selector.expression: (.["@graph"]? // [.] )[] | ( .distribution[]? | select(."@type"? == "DataDownload") | .encodingFormat ) // ( if .distribution?."@type"? == "DataDownload" then .distribution.encodingFormat else null end )
